definition: Eason Chan (1974-), Hong Kong pop singer and actor
surname Chen/Chen (c. 1045 - 479 BC), a Zhou dynasty state/Chen (557-589), one of the Southern Dynasties 南朝[Nan2 Chao2]
to lay out/to exhibit/to display/to narrate/to state/to explain/to tell/old/stale
abundant/graceful
rapid/fast

sentences.english: The great Eason Chan, another legend in the Chinese scene.
sentences.chinese: 优秀的陈奕迅，华语世界的又一传奇。

sentences.english: Eason chan of singing of love is a kind of pure love .
sentences.chinese: 陈奕迅对歌唱的挚爱是一种纯真的爱。

sentences.english: My favorite singer is Eason Chan.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢的歌手是陈奕迅。

sentences.english: Eason Chan who is one of the best live singer in Hong Kong published his new chinese album.
sentences.chinese: 陈奕迅发行了他的最新专辑《上五楼的快活》。

sentences.english: Eason Chan and Sherry Chang grabbed the Best Male and Female Artist Awards that night.
sentences.chinese: 陈奕迅和张惠妹当晚分别摘走了最佳男女艺人的奖项。
